ca.cgjennings.spelling.ui

Interface LookupServiceProvider


  • public interface LookupServiceProvider
    A lookup service provider presents the user with definitions, alternatives, or other information about words in a language.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Locale[] getSupportedLocales()
      Returns an array of the locales supported by this service provider.
      boolean isConfigurable()
      Returns true if this provider has user-settable peferences.
      boolean isLocaleSupported(Locale loc)
      Returns true if the requested locale is supported by this service provider.
      boolean isWordKnown(WordTokenizer.WordResult word)
      Returns true if this provider can provide information about the requested word.
      void lookup(WordTokenizer.WordResult word, JComponent context)
      Performs a word lookup, displaying information about the word to the user.
      void showConfigurationWindow(JWindow parent, JComponent context)
      Returns a component (usually a JPanel that can be used to configure this provider, if configuraton is supported.

    • Method Detail

      • getSupportedLocales

        Locale[] getSupportedLocales()
        Returns an array of the locales supported by this service provider.
        Returns:
        an array of supported locales; supporting a language-only locale implies some level of support for any locale with that language

      • isConfigurable

        boolean isConfigurable()
        Returns true if this provider has user-settable peferences.
        Returns:
        true if a configuration panel is available

      • isLocaleSupported

        boolean isLocaleSupported(Locale loc)
        Returns true if the requested locale is supported by this service provider.
        Parameters:
        loc - the locale to test
        Returns:
        true if some level of support is available from this provider

      • isWordKnown

        boolean isWordKnown(WordTokenizer.WordResult word)
        Returns true if this provider can provide information about the requested word.
        Parameters:
        word - the word to be looked up
        Returns:
        true if looking up the word would have an effect

      • lookup

        void lookup(WordTokenizer.WordResult word,
            JComponent context)
        Performs a word lookup, displaying information about the word to the user. If the word is not known, this method has no effect and returns null. Otherwise, a window or other display is created to show applicable information. If a non-null value is returned, then it is a selected replacement word for the original word (i.e., the service provider is functioning as a thesaurus).
        Parameters:
        word - the word to display information about
        context - a possibly null component that may be useful to guide placement of the lookup window

      • showConfigurationWindow

        void showConfigurationWindow(JWindow parent,
                             JComponent context)
        Returns a component (usually a JPanel that can be used to configure this provider, if configuraton is supported.
        Parameters:
        parent - a parent window for the configuration window
        context - a component that can optionally be used to help place the window
